rules: Rule1: If the conference paper is presented, then the conservation program receives funding.
Rule2: Either the emergency response is activated, or if the chemical leak is detected, then the water source is contaminated.
Rule3: If the health warning is issued, then the evacuation order is broadcast.
Rule4: Either the health warning is issued, or the state of emergency is declared.
Rule5: If the state of emergency is declared, then the NGO operates.
Rule6: If the wildlife corridor is designated, then the forest reserve is protected.
Rule7: If the evacuation order is broadcast, then the nearby village is evacuated.
Rule8: If the expert panel is convened, then if it is not the case that the research findings being published leads to the conference paper being presented, the conservation strategy is revised.
Rule9: Either the expert panel is convened, or the crisis team is assembled.
Rule10: If the crisis team is assembled, then if it is not the case that the research findings being published leads to the conference paper being presented, the conservation strategy is revised.
Rule11: If the wildlife population is monitored, then the ecosystem is restored.
Rule12: Either the international grant is secured, or if the NGO does not operate, then the wildlife population is monitored.
Rule13: Either the anti-poaching unit is deployed, or the logging permit is not approved.
Rule14: If the black rhino is sighted, then if the anti-poaching unit is deployed, the anti-poaching unit patrols the rhino habitat.
Rule15: If the public awareness campaign is launched, then the research findings are published.
Rule16: Either the public awareness campaign is launched, or the corporate sponsorship is initiated.
Rule17: If the corporate sponsorship is initiated, then the NGO operates.
Rule18: If the conservation program receives funding, then the NGO operates.
Rule19: If it is not the case that the research findings being published leads to the conference paper being presented, then the conservation program is halted.
Rule20: If it is not the case that the research findings being published leads to the conference paper being presented, then the conservation program is not halted.
Rule21: If it is not the case that the research findings being published leads to the conference paper being presented, then the conservation strategy is not revised.
Rule22: If it is not the case that the NGO not operating leads to the ecosystem being restored, then the chemical leak is detected.
Rule23: If it is not the case that the NGO not operating leads to the wildlife corridor being designated, then the logging permit is approved.
Rule24: If the NGO does not operate, then the forest reserve is not protected.
Rule25: If the NGO does not operate, then the ecosystem is not restored.
facts: Fact1: The black rhino is sighted.
Fact2: The water source is not contaminated.
Fact3: The emergency response is not activated.
Fact4: The nearby village is not evacuated.
Fact5: The international grant is not secured.
Fact6: The anti-poaching unit does not patrol the rhino habitat.
